channel.title: Comments on: Copying data into other tables while eliminating duplicates
channel.description: Web development notes and commentary from Ryan Stille

item.title: By: Michael
item.dc:creator: Michael
item.description:
Any idea on how to handle a table with a more complex where clause?
I have a table that has three columns that act like a unique field.
Kind of like this: WHERE email, ssn, dob NOT IN (SELECT email, ssn, dob FROM reportUsers)
Ideas?
item.content:encoded:
Any idea on how to handle a table with a more complex where clause?

I have a table that has three columns that act like a unique field.

Kind of like this: WHERE email, ssn, dob NOT IN (SELECT email, ssn, dob FROM reportUsers)

Ideas?
